Sentencas: Shape optimization of fuel channels in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) is presented.
Titulo: Channel shape optimization of solid oxide fuel cells using advanced numerical techniques

Sentencas: A three-dimensional, implicit, multi-species fuel cell solver is developed to compute the baseline solution.
Titulo: Channel shape optimization of solid oxide fuel cells using advanced numerical techniques

Sentencas: Sensitivity derivatives required for the optimization are computed using the discrete adjoint method.
Titulo: Channel shape optimization of solid oxide fuel cells using advanced numerical techniques

Sentencas: A gradient-based optimizer is utilized to update the design variables.
Titulo: Channel shape optimization of solid oxide fuel cells using advanced numerical techniques

Sentencas: The geometry of the fuel channel is parameterized to obtain meaningful design variables using a recently developed technique that is applicable for multi-disciplinary design optimization.
Titulo: Channel shape optimization of solid oxide fuel cells using advanced numerical techniques

Sentencas: During the design process, the mesh is continually modified to reflect the changes in the underlying geometry.
Titulo: Channel shape optimization of solid oxide fuel cells using advanced numerical techniques

Sentencas: An automated environment to sequentially execute the aforementioned processes is developed.
Titulo: Channel shape optimization of solid oxide fuel cells using advanced numerical techniques

Sentencas: Cost functions representating the cell voltage and uniform distribution of fuel among all channels are optimized with respect to the shape of the fuel channels.
Titulo: Channel shape optimization of solid oxide fuel cells using advanced numerical techniques
